subject: how to run single test method inside TestCase using Ant
msgSnippet: Is it possible, using the junit task from Ant (1.6), to run a single test method inside a TestCase class? [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messageBody:
Is it possible, using the junit task from Ant (1.6), to run a single test
method inside a TestCase class?
